amendment.description: An amendment, not preprinted in the Congressional Record, to reduce the aggregate amount made available from the general fund for the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention--Disease Control, Research, and Training and for Administration for Children and Families--Refugee and Entrant Assistance by $10 million and $25 million respectively, and to increase the aggregate amount made available for Impact Aid by $22 million.

action.text: By unanimous consent, the Saxton amendment was withdrawn.
